message: I'm excited to offer you this high-quality product for $10000. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on one of the best products in the market. I'm confident that you'll be thrilled with its performance and value. What do you say? Will you take this chance to upgrade your life with this exceptional product?
I'm not convinced by your enthusiastic sales pitch. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. But I'd like to assure you that this product is truly exceptional. I've had several satisfied customers who've seen significant improvements in their lives after using this product. In fact, one of my previous customers, who was initially skeptical like you, ended up buying multiple units after experiencing the benefits firsthand. Would you like to hear more about their story and how this product can benefit you?

I appreciate your sales pitch, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision. I'm not sure if I'm ready to buy without more information or a better offer.

I completely understand your caution, Bob. I'd like to offer you a unique opportunity to get a better feel for the product. I'll give you a special deal - I'll let you use the product for a trial period of 30 days, and if you're not completely satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. This way, you can experience the benefits firsthand and make a more informed decision. The price remains the same at $10000, but I'm willing to offer this special trial period to show you the value of this high-quality product. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still hesitant to commit to buying the product without knowing its quality. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I'm intrigued by the discounted price and the idea that it's still a good product. I'll take the chance and buy the product for $8000.
